post.body: Peggy Post would not approve. Not at all. Murder is never befitting a civil society. But if she accidentally trips? Hmmm...
see you at ref desk saturday whoot!
Had a mere two glasses of wine for nye and am exhausted 2day. Hello old age. Happy new year friends!
To the guy who stopped to pull me and the car out of the snow drift: thank you, good samaritan!
It is warmer at the north pole than in detroit right now. Awesome!
finally remembered my twitter log-in. sorry, my darlings. i hope you can forgive me.
Is unimpressed with customer service call centers. No, I will not please hold anymore. Insert temper tantrum here.
Trying to act like I don't know a party is being planned for me at work. The six 2-liters of pop kinda gave it away tho...
AT&T is dysfunctional and they are not my friend.
The moving process has me on my last nerve.
Getting off my a$$ and finally updating my twitter and meebo accounts.
i am having twitter troubles. waiting for them to fix technical difficulties.
